statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 6 , -4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 1 , -5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 5 , x^{2} + 6 \, x - 15 , -x^{3} + x^{2} - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
